TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit CustomAttributeNamedArgument extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 表示仅反射上下文中的自定义属性的命名自变量。

span.span: Represents a named argument of a custom attribute in the reflection-only context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不能执行在仅反射上下文中检查的代码, 因此, 不一定总是可以通过创建自定义属性的实例, 然后使用、 等方法来检查它们的属性, 来检查它们的属性.Code that is being examined in the reflection-only context cannot be executed, so it is not always possible to examine custom attributes by creating instances of them and then examining their properties, using methods like , , and so on. 如果属性类型本身的代码加载到仅反射上下文中, 则无法执行该代码。If the code for the attribute type itself is loaded into the reflection-only context, it cannot be executed. 类使用结构来提供对为自定义特性实例指定的命名参数的访问, 而不执行自定义特性类型的相应属性的代码。 The structure is used by the class to provide access to a named argument specified for a custom attribute instance, without executing the code of the corresponding property of the custom attribute type. 属性返回一个结构, 该结构包含命名参数的类型和值。 The property returns a structure that contains the type and value of the named argument. > [!IMPORTANT] > 无论参数是命名参数还是位置参数, 都必须使用结构访问其类型和值。Whether an argument is named or positional, you must access its type and value by using the structure. 若要创建类的实例, 请`static` 使用工厂方法。To create instances of the class, use the `static` factory method. ## Examples 下面的示例定义了一个具有四个构造函数和四个属性的自定义特性。The following example defines a custom attribute with four constructors and four properties. 两个属性是只读的, 并且是通过使用构造函数的位置参数设置的。Two of the properties are read-only, and are set by using the positional parameters of the constructors. 其他两个属性是可读/写的, 只能通过使用命名参数来设置。The other two properties are read/write, and can be set only by using named arguments. 一个位置属性是字符串数组, 一个命名的属性是一个整数数组。One positional property is an array of strings, and one named property is an array of integers. 该特性可应用于程序集、在该程序集中声明的类型、该类型的方法以及该方法的参数。The attribute is applied to the assembly, to a type declared in the assembly, to a method of the type, and to a parameter of the method. 在这些情况下使用不同的构造函数。Different constructors are used for these cases. 当执行时, 该程序集会将其自身加载到仅反射上下文中, 并显示有关已应用于该属性的自定义特性的信息以及它所包含的类型和成员的信息。When executed, the assembly loads itself into the reflection-only context and displays information about the custom attributes that were applied to it and to the type and members it contains. 应用于该类型的特性演示数组属性, 同时包含位置参数和命名参数。The attribute that is applied to the type demonstrates array properties, with both positional and named arguments. [!code-cpp[CustomAttributeData#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CustomAttributeData/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomAttributeData#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CustomAttributeData/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CustomAttributeData#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CustomAttributeData/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property TypedValue As CustomAttributeTypedArgument

summary.span: 获取一个 结构，该结构可用于获取当前指定参数的类型和值。

span.span: Gets a structure that can be used to obtain the type and value of the current named argument.

value.span: 一个结构，可用于获取当前命名参数的类型和值。

span.span: A structure that can be used to obtain the type and value of the current named argument.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该结构只包含有关如何设置参数值的信息。The structure only contains information about how the argument value was set. 使用此属性可获取包含类型和值的结构。Use this property to obtain a structure that contains the type and value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例定义了一个具有四个构造函数和四个属性的自定义特性。The following code example defines a custom attribute with four constructors and four properties. 两个属性是只读的, 并且是通过使用构造函数的位置参数设置的。Two of the properties are read-only, and are set by using the positional parameters of the constructors. 其他两个属性是可读/写的, 只能通过使用命名参数来设置。The other two properties are read/write, and can be set only by using named arguments. 一个位置属性是字符串数组, 一个命名的属性是一个整数数组。One positional property is an array of strings, and one named property is an array of integers. 该特性可应用于程序集、在该程序集中声明的类型、该类型的方法以及该方法的参数。The attribute is applied to the assembly, to a type declared in the assembly, to a method of the type, and to a parameter of the method. 在这些情况下使用不同的构造函数。Different constructors are used for these cases. 执行时, 该程序集会将其自身加载到仅反射上下文中, 并显示自定义属性。When executed, the assembly loads itself into the reflection-only context and displays the custom attributes. 应用于该类型的特性演示数组属性, 同时包含位置参数和命名参数。The attribute that is applied to the type demonstrates array properties, with both positional and named arguments. 属性用于显示自定义属性`ShowAttributeData`数据的方法中, 用于获取命名属性的类型和值。 The property is used in the `ShowAttributeData` method that displays custom attribute data, to obtain the types and values of named attributes. [!code-cpp[CustomAttributeData#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CustomAttributeData/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomAttributeData#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CustomAttributeData/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CustomAttributeData#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CustomAttributeData/VB/source.vb#1)]
